requireNoRepositories.message: The POM must not include repository definitions since non Apache repositories threaten the build stability.

scripts.script: import java.util.Date import java.text.MessageFormat project.properties['release_date'] = MessageFormat.format("{0,date,MMMMM dd, yyyy}", new Date()) project.properties['release_version'] = project.version.replaceAll("-SNAPSHOT", "") project.properties['skipSiteSite'] = String.valueOf(!new File(project.basedir, 'src/site/site.xml').exists())
